name: Project Nightmare (impylukkarila)
description:
For my modifications I focused on 3D modeling in maya. 

I was trying to make a science lab to match the space theme, of a futuristic lab. 

I 3D modeled a desk, chair, computer + keyboard, as well as some lab equipment. I added basic textures in maya, but I wasn't aware they sadly didn't import. 

I made some candles dripping because I was going to create a spooky lit environment with dripping candles, but of course I overestimated my time management and skills yet again, hence the oddly placed candles on the desk.
